modName: Teldryn Sero Twin Brother Endryn - Marriage and Follower
summary: Did you get excited when you met Teldryn Sero but then suffer the disappointment of not being able to marry him?  Well you still can\'t but you can marry his identical twin brother, Endryn!
descriptionHtml:
[size=48pt][color=yellow][b] Teldryn Sero\'s Twin Brother Endryn [/b][/color][/size]

[b]Requires Dragonborn DLC[/b]

Did you get excited when you met Teldryn Sero but then suffer the disappointment of not being able to marry him?  Well you still can\'t but you can marry his identical twin brother, Endryn!

Endryn Sero is almost exactly like his brother Teldryn except as with most siblings they do have a slighly different voice (such a shame I know).

Endryn fights like his brother, levels like his brother and comes equiped with a set of Dark Brotherhood Armour (because it looked fantastic on him!)

He can be located in the Bannered Mare (Whiterun).

Download with Nexus Mod Manager and place him low in your mod order.

Enjoy!
author: UlanX

files.name: Endryn Sero Marriage Partner and Follower
